A colleage, and collector, has recently purchased the sukashi tsuba 
illustrated in my Photo Album JPL and has asked for my advice 
regarding its possible attribution and for a translation of the red 
lacquer inscription  The figure on the bottom left appears to be a 
kao, but I am otherwise at a complete loss.  Any help/suggestions re 
either of these requests would be much appreciated.

While you are in my Photo Album, I am still seeking some information 
on the gold, hira-zogan seal.  There has been a complete absence of 
replies to my earlier request regarding this.

Grateful thanks and regards, JPL.
